text: Salzland is a district in the middle of Saxony-Anhalt, Germany. == History == The district was made by joining the old districts of Bernburg, Schönebeck and Aschersleben-Staßfurt (except the town Falkenstein) as part of the boundary changes of 2007 == Towns and municipalities == Free towns Free municipalities # Calbe # Könnern # Bördeland # Förderstedt Verwaltungsgemeinschaften Verwaltungsgemeinschaften Verwaltungsgemeinschaften * 1.
